PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-10622003-07-24,  ACOA,  ,  , 
ActEnterprise Cape Breton Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of State (Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency) of ROBERT McFADGEN, of Marion Bridge, Nova Scotia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Enterprise Cape Breton Corporation to hold office for a term of two years, in the place of Spyro Trifos, who has resigned.
AttachmentsAttachment
